body:
Add v1.57.0 to Rclone which includes multiple new features and bug fixes.

**Changelog:**
- New Backends
  - Sia: for Sia decentralized cloud
  - Hasher: caches hashes and enable hashes for backends that don't support them 
- New Features
  - Move with --ignore-existing will not delete skipped files
  - Support hyphen in remote name from environment variable


Full changelog can be found [here](https://rclone.org/changelog/#v1-57-0-2021-11-01).

**Test Plan:**
Rclone v1.57.0 built sucessfully within the Autamus Workflow [here](https://github.com/autamus/registry/actions/runs/1412797916).
title: Add v1.57.0 to Rclone
